Package hac.ex4.services

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.services.BookService
@Service public class BookService extends Object
This service handles the repositories for the books and payments

    • pay

      public void pay(List<Long> bookIds, String name) throws Exception
      Makes the payment, if there is a problem with the books or the stock it throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      bookIds - - list of book ids that the user want to purchase
      name - - the user's name
      Throws:
      Exception - - if the book is not in stock anymore or deleted by the admin.
